titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the New-York Historical Society Scrapbook Collection
1841-1965
MS 3158
titlestmt.author: Elise Winks

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-12 14:17:00 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: The scrapbook collection consists of scrapbooks acquired from various sources. Materials in the scrapbooks range from photographs, correspondence, programs, tickets, and other ephemera to compilations of newspaper clippings. The scrapbooks in this collection were all created by various individuals, families, and organizations, and the contents within reflect their interests and life events.
did.langmaterial: The documents in the collection are in English.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
Photocopying undertaken by staff only. Limited to 20 exposures of stable, unbound material per day.
Application to use images from this collection for publication should be made in writing to: Department of Rights and Reproductions, The New-York Historical Society, 170 Central Park West, New York, NY 10024-5194, rightsandrepro@nyhistory.org. Phone: (212) 873-3400 ext. 282.

Copyrights and other proprietary rights may subsist in individuals and entities other than the New-York Historical Society, in which case the patron is responsible for securing permission from those parties. For fuller information about rights and reproductions from N-YHS visit: https://www.nyhistory.org/about/rights-reproductions

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: The collection should be cited as: New-York Historical Society scrapbook collection, MS 3158, New-York Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection is not processed. As part of a project conducted in 2019-20, archivist Elise Winks performed a high level survey of the collection and described it broadly in this preliminary finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: TBD

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 2 volumes of clippings, photographs, invitations, event placecards, and other ephemera belonging to Daniel Gordon (vol. 1) and Nathan Gordon (vol. 2).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume scrapbook of a 1935 road trip taken by the Dowlin family around the United States, Mexico, and Canada. Depicts Winifred, Calista, and Jennie Dowlin. Contains photographs, maps, postcards, and ephemera as well as journal entries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume scrapbook from Anson F. Robinson's World War I service in the United States Army, 305th infantry. Contains photographs, correspondence, certificates, and clippings from the time he served, as well as programs and other material from later commemorative events.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume letterheads and stationery from various hotels.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume containing certificates, programs, and ribbons from various banquets and events.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings containing poetry and various other pieces of literature.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 7 volumes newspaper clippings, handwritten notes, photographs, postcards, and other ephemera. Some clippings are specifically about housing and real estate, others are general news items.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 10 volumes of newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 3 volumes of newspaper clippings on the topics of Japan and the World War (vol. 1) and Ancient Egypt (vols. 2-3).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume scrapbook of travels across the United States, Europe, and Asia. Contains postcards, correspondence, and ephemera.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume correspondence, clippings, and programs from clubs and recitals attended by Bogert.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 3 volumes of newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume containing ephemera, prints of portraits and other artwork, and illustrations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings regarding battles, developments, and other news on the Civil War.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume containing theater programs, correspondence, and newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings on merchant firm Bowen and McNamee, as well as many anti-slavery clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings of political cartoons and other illustrations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: Horticultural Articles on Scenic Beauty scrapbook

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper and magazine clippings on plants, parks, and nature. Includes articles about residents of Brooklyn and the landscape of Prospect Park.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume containing newspaper clippings and correspondence regarding the fashion industry in New York City and Carroll's career in it.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings on politics.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume of clippings and pamphlets regarding the 1940 presidential campaign and its candidates, Franklin D. Roosevelt and Wendell Willkie.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume containing newspaper clippings, programs, invitations, pressed flowers, bells, and other ephemera.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 2 scrapbook volumes of newspaper clippings on countrywide events, as well as some correspondence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume entitled "Proceedings of the Board of Alderman" with newspaper clippings pasted over the text. Some pages of the original text are still fully visible.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings.

did.unittitle: Reminiscences of a Civil War Veteran

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume photographs, clippings, and programs compiled by M. Bornstein.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Newspaper clippings regarding George Washington.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume scrapbook containing clippings and correspondence regarding the fashion industry, and Dea Carroll's career in it, in New York City.

did.unittitle: Fine Arts and War Relief During World War I

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume programs, notes, and ephemera from Blanche Smith's life, particularly her graduation from Canisteo High School in Canisteo, New York.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume theater and musical programs and clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 2 volumes of newspaper clippings on the following topics:. Vol. 1: Stock market Vol. 2: Bicycles

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume clippings, illustrations, cards, and some correspondence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume cards, calendars, correspondence, advertisements, and trade cards.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings. There are some handwritten pages tucked in between the pages.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 4 volumes: Vol. 1: Newspaper clippings Vol. 2: Programs, bulletins, invitations Vol. 3: Clippings, postcards Vol. 4: Full newspapers, clippings, postcards, pamphlets

did.unittitle: Lawrence Smith School for Boys scrapbook

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume compiled by Clement L. Smith. Contains photos, correspondence, and pamphlets.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 2 volumes of correspondence, photos, postcards, and clippings regarding the YMCA.

scopecontent.p: 3 volumes of newspaper clippings regarding the Butlers' Balls held in New York City in 1934, 1936, and 1937.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 9 volumes newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.p: 2 volumes of newspaper clippings regarding the New York City subway system. Also includes 1 box of buttons, pins, and other ephemera.

scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings regarding the history of New York.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume material from the time Sawyer spent as a student at Packer Collegiate Institute.

scopecontent.p: 12 volumes of newspaper clippings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume of materials regarding Laird's time as a student at Columbia University.

did.unittitle: Philharmonic Society of New York scrapbooks

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 7 volumes of programs from and newspaper clippings advertising performances.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 4 volumes of clippings of the British Royal Family, American politicians including the Franklin D. Roosevelt family, and other celebrities, historical figures, and artists. Also contains a box of clippings and some loose newspapers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume containing art prints and illustrations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 5 volumes of scrapbooks containing correspondence and programs. Also includes a copy of "Dr. May's Quiz," a booklet on medicine, and a program for "Falstaff."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 5 volumes of newspaper clippings regarding boxing and various crimes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume containing theater programs, dinner menus, and other event programs.

did.unittitle: Adelaide de Groot scrapbook and genealogy

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume theater scrapbook containing programs, clippings, and correspondence. Also includes 1 box of de Groot and Hawley family journals, notes, clippings, correspondence, and family histories.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 12 volumes including: 2 vol. Edward Schermerhorn's personal scrapbooks, with clippings, correspondence, photographs regarding his family, particularly the Giberts. 2 vol. scrapbooks pertaining to the Seventh Regiment 1 program for an annual meeting for Seventh Regiment 7 published books

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 9 volumes containing matchbook covers from various United States military bases and hotels, collected by Hess's brother Harvey J. Hess.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume newspaper clippings and some papers, including correspondence, regarding the New York Stock Exchange.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1 volume of newspaper clippings regarding David Dow's failing health and death. Most clippings are obituaries from various newspapers.
